name: 이호산
detail:
Ho San Lee works as a dubber, voice actor and as an actor. He voiced the character Anago and sea bass in the Korean movie called "PADAK", a movie from 2012 and the girl's dad, bug inside head, panel-Kang Chung-gon and Nicholas in the Movie "The Story of Mr. Sorry" from 2008.

Some of his popular characters (Korean Dubbing):

Ryohei Sasagawa (Katekyo Hitman Reborn)
Sanada Ryu (Kimi ni Todoke)
Usui Kazuyoshi (Sket Dance)
Matsuno Choromatsu (Osomatsu)
Lúcio Correia dos Santos (Overwatch)
